name: What Would Rose Do?
description:
What Would Rose Do - a very silly and very hungry interactive adventure!

Now it is beginning of a fantastic story! Let us make a journey to the world of Rose! What you’re about to read isn’t like a regular story! For one thing, you star in it, playing the role of Rose, an adventure-loving foodie who loves to eat everything around her! At every turn there's a decision for you to make to change her life overly dramatically! There’s plenty of twists and turns in this story, and even a secret hidden ending!

I hope you like this silly story!

xoxo Cam

PS: You can read Rose comics online! http://Rosecomic.com/

(c) Cameron Davis 2020
Petunia Pickle (c) Ant Stiller 2020
